metadata.title: CVE-2015-1170 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description: The NVIDIA Display Driver R304 before 309.08, R340 before 341.44, R343before 345.20, and R346 before 347.52 does not properly validate localclient impersonation levels when performing a "kernel administrator check,"which allows local users to gain administrator privileges via unspecifiedAPI calls.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-310-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
